summary: An FBI email from 2025 regarding a vetting request for Timothy Cook Draper for the ARMS Reach program (proximity to POTUS). The email details derogatory information on Draper's associations, including links to Jeffrey Epstein's network, a Russian publicist, and a business partner involved in blackmail operations similar to Epstein's.

persons.name: Timothy Cook Draper
persons.role: Billionaire hedge fund manager and investor, subject of FBI vetting
persons.context: Subject of an FBI ARMS Reach vetting request due to associations with Jeffrey Epstein's network, Russian figures, and a business partner involved in blackmail.

persons.name: Ted Waitt
persons.context: Identified as the broker who introduced Jeffrey Epstein to Bill Gates.

persons.name: Charles Lieber
persons.context: Identified as a member of the Foresight Institute alongside Ted Waitt.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced as being introduced to Bill Gates by Ted Waitt, and as a comparator for blackmail operations conducted by Frank Moyle Creer.

persons.name: Bill Gates
persons.context: Identified as having been introduced to Jeffrey Epstein by Ted Waitt.

persons.name: Viktor Yushchenko
persons.context: Met with Timothy Draper in Ukraine to discuss opposing U.S. sanctions against Russia.

persons.name: Michael Caputo
persons.context: Met with Timothy Draper and Viktor Yushchenko in Ukraine to discuss opposing U.S. sanctions against Russia.

persons.name: Masha Drokova
persons.role: Publicist (also known as Mania Drokova, Mariya Bucher)
persons.context: Hired by Draper as a publicist for DFJ Financial; former publicist for Jeffrey Epstein and for quantum computing firms QWave Capital and Runa Capital; known for kissing Vladimir Putin on TV as a teen.

persons.name: Vladimir Putin
persons.context: Mentioned as having been kissed on television by a teenage Masha Drokova.

persons.name: Serguei Beloussov
persons.role: Russian technologist and entrepreneur (also known as Serg Bell)
persons.context: Heads quantum computing investment firms QWave Capital and Runa Capital; based in Singapore.

persons.name: Serguei Kouzmine
persons.context: Co-founded QWave Capital with Serguei Beloussov; also co-founded Fintech Ventures and Ritzio Entertainment with Oleg Boyko.

persons.name: Oleg Boyko
persons.context: Co-founded Fintech Ventures and Ritzio Entertainment with Serguei Kouzmine.

persons.name: Frank Moyle Creer
persons.role: Chief Executive Officer of Draper Hero Institute
persons.context: Former officer with Draper at DFJ Capital; alleged to have run a blackmail operation from a sex/swingers club called 'Sanctum', similar to Jeffrey Epstein; funneled money into quantum computing research.

persons.name: Steve Jurvetson
persons.context: Fellow DFJ Capital managing partner who was actively blackmailed by Frank Moyle Creer; also an investor in QWave Capital through Runa Capital.

connections.description: Draper hired Drokova as the publicist for his former technology hedge fund, DFJ Financial.
Creer was the CEO of Draper's not-for-profit Draper Hero Institute and was previously an officer with Draper at DFJ Capital.
Waitt was the broker of the introduction between Jeffrey Epstein and Bill Gates.
Drokova was the former publicist for Jeffrey Epstein.
Creer actively blackmailed Jurvetson, his fellow managing partner at DFJ Capital.
Creer also knew Masha Drokova, the publicist of QWave Capital.
Creer's alleged blackmail operation from the 'Sanctum' club is described as similar to Jeffrey Epstein's methods.
Co-founders of the quantum computing investment firm QWave Capital.
Creer funneled money into quantum computing research through Beloussov's firm, QWave Capital.
Draper traveled to Ukraine and met with former President Yushchenko to discuss opposing U.S. sanctions against Russia.

events.title: FBI ARMS Reach Vetting Request for Timothy Draper
events.description: The FBI's Enterprise Vetting Center sends a high-priority request for derogatory information on Timothy Cook Draper to determine his suitability to be in close proximity to the President of the United States.

events.title: Introduction of Epstein to Bill Gates
events.description: Ted Waitt brokers an introduction between convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein and billionaire Bill Gates.

events.title: Draper's Meeting in Ukraine on Sanctions
events.description: Timothy Draper travels to Ukraine to meet with former President Viktor Yushchenko and Michael Caputo to discuss ways to oppose U.S. sanctions against Russia.

events.title: Creer appointed CEO of Draper Hero Institute
events.description: Frank Moyle Creer becomes the Chief Executive Officer of Timothy Draper's not-for-profit organization, the Draper Hero Institute.

events.title: Creer's Blackmail Operation at 'Sanctum' Club
events.description: Frank Moyle Creer, an active member of the high-end sex/swingers club 'Sanctum,' collects information on members for the purpose of blackmail, similar to Jeffrey Epstein's methods. He actively blackmails his business partner Steve Jurvetson.

locations: 55 East 3rd Avenue, San Mateo, California (Draper Hero Institute address)
Winchester, VA (location of FBI Enterprise Vetting Center)
keyFacts: Timothy Cook Draper was being vetted by the FBI in 2025 for potential proximity to the President due to associations with individuals linked to Jeffrey Epstein and alleged blackmail operations.
Draper's former publicist, Masha Drokova, had also been the publicist for convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

Draper's business associate, Frank Moyle Creer, allegedly ran a blackmail operation from a sex club called 'Sanctum', explicitly compared to Jeffrey Epstein's methods, and blackmailed his partner Steve Jurvetson.
Creer funneled money into quantum computing research through QWave Capital, a firm with Russian ties, as a means to gain access to politicians and decision-makers, potentially for blackmail.
Draper had previously met with former Ukrainian President Viktor Yushchenko to discuss opposing U.S. sanctions against Russia.
